SELECT: CASE WHEN SUM("NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES") = 0 THEN 0 ELSE TO_INT(SUM("NUMBER_OF_QUALIFIED_EMPLOYEES") * 100 / SUM("NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES")) END AS "QUALIFICATIONPERCENTAGE"
